name: Engineering For Kids - After-School Enrichment Program
description: Weekly after-school engineering classes for elementary students. Hands-on projects in robotics, structures, aerospace, and more. Small class sizes with certified instructors.

name: Engineering For Kids - Full-Day Summer Camp
description: Week-long full-day engineering camp with multiple themed projects. Topics include robotics, architecture, aerospace, chemical engineering, and video game design.

name: Engineering For Kids - Half-Day Summer Camp
description: Morning or afternoon engineering camp sessions. Focused hands-on projects in specific engineering disciplines. Perfect for younger students or combined with other activities.

name: LEGO Robotics Engineering Program
description: Build and program LEGO robots using EV3 and WeDo platforms. Learn engineering design process, programming logic, and problem-solving through robotic challenges.

name: Architecture and Structures Engineering
description: Design and build bridges, towers, and buildings. Learn about structural engineering, load distribution, and architectural design through hands-on construction projects.

name: Aerospace Engineering Program
description: Explore flight, rocketry, and space exploration. Design and launch rockets, build gliders and airplanes, learn about aerodynamics and propulsion systems.

name: Video Game Design Engineering
description: Create video games while learning programming concepts. Use block-based coding and game design software to build interactive games and animations.

name: Chemical Engineering and Science
description: Hands-on chemistry experiments and chemical engineering projects. Learn about reactions, states of matter, polymers, and materials science through safe experiments.

name: Mechanical Engineering and Machines
description: Build machines, gears, pulleys, and mechanical systems. Learn about simple machines, mechanical advantage, and engineering design through hands-on construction.

name: Electrical Engineering and Circuits
description: Build circuits and electronic devices. Learn about electricity, conductors, LED lights, switches, and basic electronics through hands-on circuit projects.

name: Engineering For Kids - Birthday Party Program
description: Engineering-themed birthday parties with hands-on projects. Choose from robotics, rocketry, structures, or other themes. Instructor-led activities for groups.

name: Engineering For Kids - School Break Camps
description: Spring break, winter break, and holiday break engineering camps. Multi-day programs with themed projects when school is not in session.

name: Engineering For Kids - Preschool STEM
description: Introduction to engineering concepts for preschoolers ages 4-5. Age-appropriate hands-on activities exploring simple machines, building, and problem-solving.

name: Advanced Robotics and Programming
description: Advanced robotics for experienced students. Program complex robot behaviors, compete in challenges, and explore advanced engineering concepts.

name: Engineering Design Challenge Program
description: Multi-week program where students tackle real-world engineering challenges. Apply design thinking, prototyping, testing, and iteration to solve problems.

name: 3D Design and Printing Engineering
description: Learn 3D modeling and printing technology. Design objects using CAD software and bring them to life with 3D printers.

name: Marine Engineering and Ocean Science
description: Explore underwater engineering, boat design, and ocean science. Build submarines, boats, and underwater vehicles while learning about marine environments.

name: Renewable Energy Engineering
description: Learn about sustainable energy through hands-on projects. Build solar panels, wind turbines, and explore energy efficiency and environmental engineering.

name: Transportation Engineering
description: Design and build vehicles, trains, and transportation systems. Learn about motion, friction, and engineering solutions for moving people and goods.

name: Biomedical Engineering for Kids
description: Introduction to medical engineering and human body systems. Design prosthetics, learn about medical devices, and explore how engineering helps people.

name: Engineering For Kids - Weekend Workshops
description: One-time weekend engineering workshops on various topics. Drop-in format for students to try engineering projects without long-term commitment.

name: Engineering For Kids - In-School Field Trips
description: Bring engineering to your school. Instructors visit schools to deliver hands-on engineering lessons aligned with curriculum standards.

name: Engineering For Kids - Homeschool Programs
description: Daytime engineering classes designed for homeschool students. Curriculum-aligned programs providing hands-on STEM education and socialization.
